scripts.build: pnpm run build:wasm && pnpm run check-wasm && astro build
scripts.build:wasm: cd rust-wasm/route-calculator && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../../public/wasm/route-calculator && rm ../../public/wasm/route-calculator/.gitignore && mkdir -p ../../src/wasm && cp ../../public/wasm/route-calculator/* ../../src/wasm/
scripts.check-wasm: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('./public/wasm/route-calculator/route_calculator_bg.wasm')) { console.error('❌ WASM binary missing! Run build:wasm first.'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('✅ WASM binaries found.'); }"
